data.title: What is the Abbreviation for China?
data.meta_description: How to abbreviate China. Find the common abbreviations of China and other English words at Writing Explained. The most common way to abbreviate China...
data.text:
How do you abbreviate China? There are a few ways to abbreviate China.

They are,

PRC

CN

CHN

For example,

Made in PRC

Beijing, CN

Military Ops in S. CHN sea

There is no plural for China; therefore its abbreviated forms cannot be pluralized. Note that the abbreviations are acronyms, all capitals, with no period to indicate abbreviation.

When to Use This Abbreviation

These abbreviations are usually found on postal and freight addresses, or maps. You may also see China abbreviated in headlines or newspaper titles where space is a concern.

Outside of addressing mail or freight, and on maps, abbreviations such as PRC, CN, or CHN will not appear in prose or similarly written texts

What Does China Mean?

Definition of China: China is a proper noun referring to the country officially known as the People’s Republic of China.

term that uses China is Nationalist China, a republic consisting mainly of the island of Taiwan off the S.E. coast of mainland China: under Nationalist control since 1948 but claimed by the People’s Republic of China.

Taiwan is officially known as the Republic of China (ROC), and there is some controversy on whether this state is a sovereign nation of its own or whether it is under China’s (the People’s Republic of China) authority.

For example,

Jacques is traveling this week. I expect him to be arriving in Republic of China at 2:00 a.m. our time.

Lindsay is traveling with Alexandre to Taipei, China.

China strives to limit its population by dictating to its citizens the number of children allowed by law.

China functions as a proper noun in the sentences.

Outside Examples of China

As Starbucks pushes into China, CEO says market will eclipse U.S. –Chicago Tribune

Hutchinson said Thursday that the state has signed a memorandum of understanding with Suzhou Tianyuan Garments Company. The governor is on a trade mission in China and he spoke to reporters via Skype. –Newsday

Summary: China Abbreviation

There are a few common abbreviations of China: ROC, CN, and CHN. There is only one China, therefore, abbreviations can be pluralized. Note that the most commonly accepted version is ROC, which is the acceptable abbreviation for international mail or shipment.
